channel.title: About on Sig's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on Sig's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Hello! I’m Sig, and I’m excited to welcome you to my blog. I love exploring the intersection of technology and the environment. My journey began with a degree in Geography, which ignited my interest in how we can use spatial data to solve real-world problems.

In my career, I’ve had the privilege of working with diverse teams across various sectors, including local government, tech, and real estate. I believe in the power of data to inform decision-making and drive positive change.
